_meanings:
{@--1@} To search into
or after, look after, inquire into,
investigate, explore, examine, 
ascertain; {#prasavayogyaM sTAnamanusaMDIyatAM#}
<ls>H. 3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 106.</ls>

{@--3@} To think of,
aim at, refer or allude to, consider,
deliberate; {#yaTAkartavyamanusaMDayitAM#}  
<ls>H. 3</ls>; {#nEtadanusaMDAya mayoktaM#} <ls>Mv. 6</ls> after
deliberation, or because I aimed at
it; {#alamanenAtItopAlaMBena#} 
{#prastutamanusaMDIyatAM#} <ls>H. 3</ls> let us consider what is
before us, (turn to the matter in
hand); {#atraâ€¦ iti purAvfttakaTAnu'#} 
{#saMDeyA#} <ls>Malli.</ls> on <ls>Ku. 1. 21</ls> should be
sought or referred to.

{@--6@} To take up, follow,
continue; {#tacCezamAtmavacasApya'nusaMdaDAnaH#}
<ls>K. 240</ls> following, making up the
unfinished portion &c.
